mapper.select: SELECT A.CATE_ID, A.CATE_NM AS name, A.CATE_LEVEL, A.ORDERING_NO, A.PARENT_CATE_ID, (SELECT CATE_NM FROM BG_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = A.PARENT_CATE_ID) as PARENT_NM, if((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BG_CATE WHERE PARENT_CATE_ID = A.CATE_ID) > 0, 'folder', 'item') as type FROM BG_CATE A ORDER BY A.ORDERING_NO

SELECT A.CATE_ID, A.CATE_NM AS name, A.ORDERING_NO, A.CATE_LEVEL, A.PARENT_CATE_ID, if((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BG_CATE WHERE PARENT_CATE_ID = A.CATE_ID) > 0, 'folder', 'item') as type FROM BG_CATE A WHERE CATE_LEVEL = #{cateLevel} ORDER BY A.ORDERING_NO

SELECT A.CATE_ID, A.CATE_NM AS name, A.CATE_LEVEL, A.ORDERING_NO, A.PARENT_CATE_ID, (SELECT CATE_NM FROM BG_CATE WHERE CATE_ID = A.PARENT_CATE_ID) as PARENT_NM, if((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BG_CATE WHERE PARENT_CATE_ID = A.CATE_ID) > 0, 'folder', 'item') as type FROM BG_CATE A WHERE PARENT_CATE_ID = #{parentId} ORDER BY A.ORDERING_NO
